item.title: Lava Blaze Duo 5G With 1.58-Inch Rear Display, Dimensity 7025 Chip Launched in India: Price, Specificatio... - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Lava Blaze Duo 5G With 1.58-Inch Rear Display Launched in India: See Price

Publication Date: Friday, Source: Gadgets 360

The Lava Blaze Duo 5G features a unique secondary display on the rear and is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7025 processor.

  • Price in India starts at ‚Çπ18,999 for the base model with 6GB RAM and 128GB storage.
  • Available in Arctic White and Celestial Blue colors.
  • Sales start on December 20 via Amazon, with promotional prices of ‚Çπ16,999 and ‚Çπ17,999 for different variants.
  • Features a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, 64MP rear camera, and 16MP front camera.
  • Includes a 5,000mAh battery with 33W fast charging and an IP64 rating for dust and splash resistance.
‚ÄúHDFC Bank debit and credit cardholders can avail a ‚Çπ2,000 instant discount on purchase.‚Äù

In conclusion, the Lava Blaze Duo 5G combines modern display technology with competitive pricing, making it a noteworthy entry in the budget smartphone segment.

item.title: iOS 18.2 update enhances Find My feature to recover lost items; here‚Äôs how it works - CNBCTV18
item.description:
iOS 18.2 Update Enhances Find My Feature for Recovering Lost Items

Publication Date: December 2023 | Source: CNBC TV18

Apple‚Äôs iOS 18.2 update introduces exciting new features, notably an enhanced 'Find My' function that allows users to share the location of lost items easily.

  • The update enables users to share the location of their lost items through the Find My app.
  • Users can generate a link for sharing, which doesn‚Äôt require the recipient to have an Apple device.
  • The shared link expires after one week or when the item is found.
  • A new ‚ÄòShow Contact Info‚Äô option lets recipients view the owner's contact details.
  • The update is available to all devices supporting iOS 18, but certain features are exclusive to the iPhone 15 Pro and 16 series.
‚ÄúThe best part of the upgrade is that the recipient doesn‚Äôt need an Apple device to access the location of the lost item.‚Äù

In conclusion, the iOS 18.2 update significantly improves the Find My feature, making it easier for users to retrieve lost items.

item.title: WhatsApp Will Soon Get A Dialer On iPhones To Make It Easy For Calls: Know More - News18
item.description:
WhatsApp Will Soon Get A Dialer On iPhones To Make It Easy For Calls

Date: December 16, 2024 Source: News18

WhatsApp is enhancing its app for iPhone users by introducing a dialer tab, aimed at consolidating messaging and calling functions within the app, allowing users to make calls directly from it.

  • WhatsApp will introduce a dialer tab for iPhone users.
  • This feature allows users to call others without leaving the WhatsApp app.
  • The dialer will open when clicking the + icon on the WhatsApp feed.
  • The feature is also aimed to enhance the app's integration for users, as available on Android.
  • WhatsApp will limit calls to the app's ecosystem, potentially creating issues in regions heavily reliant on traditional calling.
  • Recent updates have improved video call quality and group calling functionalities.
‚ÄúHaving its own dialer app means WhatsApp users don‚Äôt need to rely on the default dialer that is provided by Google and Apple.‚Äù

This new dialer feature aims to provide a more integrated experience for WhatsApp users on iPhones, though it may have limitations in markets where traditional phones dominate.

item.title: GTA 6 Release Date, Trailer, Maps, Gameplay, System Requirements, Leaks: All We Know So Far - Times Now
item.description:
GTA 6 Release Date, Trailer, Maps, Gameplay, System Requirements, Leaks: All We Know So Far

Date: Unknown | Source: Times Now News

The eagerly anticipated Grand Theft Auto VI is rumored to be released in Fall 2025, with exciting new features and gameplay updates.

  • Rockstar Games has confirmed the game will debut on PS5 and Xbox Series X|S, with a PC release expected later.
  • The game's first trailer, showcasing Vice City, was released on December 4, 2023.
  • Players will take on the roles of protagonists Lucia and her partner in high-stakes heists.
  • The game will expand post-launch, adding new cities and missions.
  • Cutting-edge technology such as ray tracing and improved AI will enhance gameplay realism.
  • Pricing in India is expected to be around Rs 5,500.
‚ÄúGTA 6 promises to redefine open-world gaming.‚Äù

With high expectations and advanced gameplay features, GTA 6 is set to be a major milestone in gaming, making 2025 an exciting year for fans.

item.title: The X200 Pro extends generational imaging excellence: Vivo‚Äôs Vikas Tagra - Hindustan Times
item.description:
The X200 Pro extends generational imaging excellence: Vivo‚Äôs Vikas Tagra

Publication Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Vivo X200 Pro is setting new benchmarks in smartphone photography with significant upgrades over its predecessor, the X100 Pro.

  • The new model features a 200-megapixel telephoto camera, a solid-state 6000mAh battery, and an overhauled Funtouch OS 15.
  • Vivo introduces advancements in camera technology that enhance low light performance and detail accuracy.
  • The phone is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9400 with 16GB RAM and 512GB storage, priced at ‚Çπ94,999.
‚ÄúAI will obviously keep improving. That is one differentiator we must have,‚Äù says Vikas Tagra.

The X200 Pro aims to provide a comprehensive flagship photography experience, setting high expectations for competitors while introducing advanced AI features focused on utility.

item.title: Apple Announces Best iPhone Apps And Games of 2024: Full List Here - News18
item.description:
Apple Announces Best iPhone Apps And Games of 2024: Full List Here

Date: December 16, 2024
Source: News18

Apple has unveiled the winners of the 2024 App Store Awards, highlighting exceptional apps and games across various categories recognized for their design and innovation.

  • iPhone App of the Year: Kino (LUX Optics Inc.) - A video camera app with film features.
  • iPad App of the Year: Moises (Moises Systems Inc.) - An AI app for musicians with audio features.
  • Mac App of the Year: Adobe Lightroom (Adobe Inc.) - A photo editing tool with effective search capabilities.
  • Apple Vision Pro App of the Year: What If‚Ä¶? ‚Äì An Immersive Story (Disney) - A storytelling app with graphical experiences.
  • Apple Watch App of the Year: Lumy (Raja V) - A sun exposure tracking app.
  • Apple TV App of the Year: F1 TV (Formula One Digital Media Limited) - Offers live races and highlights for F1 fans.
  • iPhone Game of the Year: AFK Journey (Farlight Games) - A tactical adventure game.
  • iPad Game of the Year: Squad Busters (Supercell) - A multiplayer logistical strategy game.
  • Mac Game of the Year: Thank Goodness You‚Äôre Here! (Panic, Inc.) - An absurd adventure game.
  • Apple Vision Pro Game of the Year: THRASHER: Arcade Odyssey (Puddle, LLC) - An engaging arcade game.
  • Apple Arcade Game of the Year: Balatro+ (Playstack Ltd.) - A strategic card game.

Cultural Impact Winners: Oko, EF Hello, Daily Art, NYT Games, The Wreck, Do You Really Want To Know? 2.

item.title: Samsung and Google team up for Gemini AI-powered XR headset - The Hindu
item.description:
Samsung and Google Collaborate on Gemini AI-Powered XR Headset

Published: December 16, 2024 12:09 pm IST | Source: The Hindu

Samsung recently revealed their collaboration with Google on an XR headset, named Project Moohan. The headset integrates Google‚Äôs Gemini AI assistant, expanding on the AI‚Äôs multimodal features.

  • The device responds to the command ‚ÄúHey Gemini‚Äù for activation, unlike the usual ‚ÄúHey Google.‚Äù
  • It incorporates advanced features such as gesture-controlled searching, virtual display for viewing media, live translation, and immersive Google Maps.
  • The headset is based on the Android XR interface.
  • Pricing details and launch specifics are yet to be announced, but it will be available next year.
  • Google is also collaborating with other firms like Magic Leap on similar XR products.
Samsung‚Äôs headset is expected to revolutionize how users interact with mixed reality through AI.

This collaboration aims to enhance user experiences with XR technologies and AI integration, marking a significant step in the evolution of immersive tech.

item.title: Exclusive: Industry leaders on tackling Ad Fatigue with Creativity, Data and Innovation - Mediabrief
item.description:
Exclusive: Industry leaders on tackling Ad Fatigue with Creativity, Data and Innovation

Publication Date: December 3, 2024

Source: MediaBrief

In a MediaBrief exclusive, industry leaders share their perspectives on the challenge of ad fatigue in today's advertising landscape, highlighting the importance of creativity, data, and innovative approaches to keep consumers engaged.

  • Balancing brand consistency with creativity is crucial.
  • Storytelling is emphasized as a key approach in ad campaigns.
  • Utilizing data-driven insights can help prevent ad fatigue.
  • Personalization and audience segmentation are vital strategies.
  • Innovative technologies like AI and interactive ads enhance engagement.
‚ÄúEmotional resonance is vital for building a lasting connection between consumers and brands.‚Äù - Prerana Singh

This discussion serves as a guide for brands aiming to evolve their advertising strategies, ensuring relevance and maintaining consumer interest amidst a saturated market.

item.title: Samsung One UI 7 Device Security app offers new features, fresh look - Sammy Fans
item.description:
Samsung One UI 7 Beta 2, 3 and 4 release dates allegedly confirmed

Published Date: December 16, 2024

Source: Sammy Fans

Samsung has confirmed the release dates for the second, third, and fourth Beta updates of One UI 7 for the Galaxy S24 series, launching a new device security app with enhanced features.

  • December 16, 2024: Beta 1 for Wave II countries, Beta 2 for Wave I countries
  • December 23, 2024: Beta 2 for Wave II countries, Beta 3 for Wave I countries
  • December 30, 2024: Beta 3 for Wave II countries, Beta 4 for Wave I countries
‚ÄúSamsung's Support executives are often blamed for crafting fake hype for consumers.‚Äù

Overall, the beta program is set to enhance user experience and address updates and functionalities based on consumer feedback.

item.title: OpenAI announces ChatGPT Projects to organise group tasks - The Hindu
item.description:
OpenAI Launches 'Projects' Feature for ChatGPT Users

Publication Date: December 16, 2024 Source: The Hindu

OpenAI has unveiled a new feature called 'Projects' for ChatGPT, enabling users to organize group tasks more effectively during its '12 Days of Shipmas' releases.

  • The Projects feature allows users to customize how ChatGPT reacts to requests related to group tasks.
  • Users can create projects by clicking on the '+' button next to the Projects icon.
  • Project icons can be personalized with different colors and titles.
  • Utilizes the GPT-4o model for enhanced performance.
  • Demonstrated features include assigning Secret Santa tasks and website creation with editable templates.
  • Available for ChatGPT Plus, Pro, and Teams, with early access for Enterprise and Edu users in the new year.
OpenAI researchers demonstrated functionality like random task assignments and reminders for household chores.

The introduction of 'Projects' indicates OpenAI's continued expansion of ChatGPT capabilities, focusing on practical applications for users.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked May Take Place on January 22; Galaxy S25 Series, Project Moohan Likely Announceme... - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung May Launch Galaxy S25 Series at Its Unpacked Event on This Date

Publication Date: December 14, 2024 | Source: Gadgets360

The Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event is set for January 22, 2025, where the company is expected to unveil the Galaxy S25 series along with a preview of Project Moohan, its new XR headset.

  • The event will take place at 10 a.m. PT in San Jose, California.
  • Samsung will announce three models: Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra.
  • Project Moohan is likely to be teased at the event, showcasing advanced features.
  • The starting price for the Galaxy S25 is expected to be $799.
  • The Galaxy S25 Ultra could cost around $1,299.
‚ÄúSamsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 üìÖ : January 22nd, 2025 üïô : 10 a.m. PT üìç : San Jose, California‚Äù ‚Äî Alvin (@sondesix)

In conclusion, the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event is highly anticipated, with significant new product announcements expected from Samsung.

item.title: Apple's AirTag 2 to Come With Improved Ultrawide-Band Chip: Mark Gurman - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Apple's AirTag 2 to Come With Improved Ultrawide-Band Chip: Mark Gurman

Published on: 15 December 2024 | Source: Gadgets 360

Apple is set to launch the second generation of its smart tracker, AirTag 2, featuring significant improvements over its predecessor, including a new ultrawide-band chip enhancing tracking capabilities.

  • The AirTag 2 is expected to feature a new ultrawide-band chip similar to the one found in the iPhone 15.
  • The new chip will reportedly triple the tracking range, which currently allows for tracking items from 10 to 30 meters away.
  • The launch date is tentatively set for mid-2025, around June to July.
  • Apple plans to implement upgraded privacy features to prevent misuse, particularly for stalking.
  • A new smart home display may be launched alongside the AirTag 2.
‚ÄúThe new ultrawide-band chip is expected to increase the Precision Finding range considerably.‚Äù - Mark Gurman

This next-generation device aims to enhance user experience and security with advanced tracking features and better privacy measures.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes, December 16, 2024 edition: How to get free skins, weapons, and diamonds today - The Financial Express
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes, December 16, 2024 edition: How to get free skins, weapons, and diamonds today

Publication Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: Financial Express

Garena Free Fire MAX, a popular battle royale game that emerged after Free Fire's ban in India, offers daily redeem codes for players, enhancing engagement with free in-game items like skins, weapons, and diamonds.

item.title: OnePlus 13 India Launch Next Month and Here Are 5 Upgrades You Should Expect - Times Now
item.description:
OnePlus 13 India Launch Next Month and Here Are 5 Upgrades You Should Expect

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: Times Now Tech

OnePlus is set to launch its flagship smartphone series next month, featuring two models: the OnePlus 13 and the OnePlus 13R. Significant upgrades are expected, including a powerful Snapdragon chip, an improved camera system, and better battery performance.

  • Improved performance with Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
  • New design featuring a Vegan leather finish and potential IP69 rating.
  • Flat display design with high refresh-rate LTPO panel.
  • Enhanced camera capabilities with upgraded sensors.
  • Increased battery capacity to 6000mAh with 100W charging support.
‚ÄúWe have seen about a 40 pct increase in the CPU performance, along with enhanced GPU and AI performance on the Snapdragon 8 Elite-powered phones.‚Äù

The OnePlus 13 launch date in India will be announced soon, as the anticipation builds around the latest offerings from OnePlus.
